description:
When attempting to launch an instance using XenAPI, there is this exception that causes the run_instance to fail

nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.py:45: exceptions.DeprecationWarning: Use of empty request context is deprecated

I looked at the code and it looks like that this call in xenapi.py is the trouble

db.project_get_network(None, instance.project_id)
title: xenapi support use empty request context
